short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Consistently visit your favorite links once a day

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Replace the new tab page with The Everyday app so that you can add your links to visit every day. The everyday app has only one feature that lets you add your favorite website links and it opens the link in a new tab if you did not visit the link for that day. 

The Everyday is a Chrome extension that replaces your new tab page with the Everyday app. With one simple feature, you can add your favorite website links and have them open in a new tab when you haven't visited them for the day. 

The Everyday app also includes a TODO list feature, allowing you to see your reminders in each new tab. With The Everyday, you can never forget to visit a site, and never lose visit streaks. Get your everyday links and reminders in one place with the Everyday Chrome extension.

You will never forget to visit a site and never lose visit streaks.

The Everyday extension also has a TODO list feature to let you add your reminder text data to a list. In that way, you can see your reminders in each new tab. 

FEATURES
✓ Link list to keep your links in a bucket
✓ Todo list added to remind your daily tasks

SUPPORT
